org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.text.graphemes

Interface GraphemeElement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttributeContainer, org.primaresearch.ident.Identifiable, TextContent, TextContentVariants
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Grapheme, GraphemeElementImpl, GraphemeGroup, NonPrintingCharacter

    public interface GraphemeElement
extends org.primaresearch.ident.Identifiable, TextContentVariants
    Interface for Graphemes, GraphemeGroups and NonPrintingCharacters
    Author:
    clc
